verses.verse: כִּ֤י <WH3588> Surely יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> Surely לַכֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> for the silver מוֹצָ֑א <WH4161> there is a vein וּ֝מָק֗וֹם <WH4725> and a place לַזָּהָ֥ב <WH2091> for gold יָזֹֽקּוּ׃ <WH2212> [where] they fine
בַּ֭רְזֶל <WH1270> Iron מֵעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> out of the earth יֻקָּ֑ח <WH3947> is taken וְ֝אֶ֗בֶן <WH68> [out of] the stone יָצ֥וּק <WH6694> [is] molten נְחוּשָֽׁה׃ <WH5154> and brass

קֵ֤ץ ׀ <WH7093> an end שָׂ֤ם <WH7760> He setteth לַחֹ֗שֶׁךְ <WH2822> to darkness וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> the farthest תַּ֭כְלִית <WH8503> all perfection ה֣וּא <WH1931> he חוֹקֵ֑ר <WH2713> and searcheth out אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> the stones אֹ֣פֶל <WH652> of darkness וְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> and the shadow of death

פָּ֤רַץ <WH6555> breaketh out נַ֨חַל ׀ <WH5158> The flood מֵֽעִם־ <WH5973> from גָּ֗ר <WH1481> from the inhabitant הַֽנִּשְׁכָּחִ֥ים <WH7911> [even the waters] forgotten מִנִּי־ <WH4480> by רָ֑גֶל <WH7272> of the foot דַּ֖לּוּ <WH1809> they are dried up מֵאֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> from men נָֽעוּ׃ <WH5128> they are gone away

אֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> [As for] the earth מִמֶּ֥נָּה <WH4480> at יֵֽצֵא־ <WH3318> out of it cometh לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> bread וְ֝תַחְתֶּ֗יהָ <WH8478> and underneath נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> and under it is turned up כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> as אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> as it were fire
מְקוֹם־ <WH4725> of it [are] the place סַפִּ֥יר <WH5601> of sapphires אֲבָנֶ֑יהָ <WH68> The stones וְעַפְרֹ֖ת <WH6083> and it hath dust זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> of gold לֽוֹ׃

נָ֭תִיב <WH5410> [There is] a path לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יְדָ֣עוֹ <WH3045> knoweth עָ֑יִט <WH5861> which no fowl וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor שְׁ֝זָפַ֗תּוּ <WH7805> hath not seen עֵ֣ין <WH5869> eye אַיָּֽה׃ <WH344> and which the vulture's

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הִדְרִיכֻ֥הוּ <WH1869> have not trodden בְנֵי־ <WH1121> whelps שָׁ֑חַץ <WH7830> The lion's לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor עָדָ֖ה <WH5710> passed עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> over שָֽׁחַל׃ <WH7826> it nor the fierce lion
בַּֽ֭חַלָּמִישׁ <WH2496> upon the rock שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He putteth forth יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> his hand הָפַ֖ךְ <WH2015> he overturneth מִשֹּׁ֣רֶשׁ <WH8328> by the roots הָרִֽים׃ <WH2022> the mountains

בַּ֭צּוּרוֹת <WH6697> among the rocks יְאֹרִ֣ים <WH2975> rivers בִּקֵּ֑עַ <WH1234> He cutteth out וְכָל־ <WH3605> anything יְ֝קָ֗ר <WH3366> every precious thing רָאֲתָ֥ה <WH7200> seeth עֵינֽוֹ׃ <WH5869> and his eye

מִ֭בְּכִי <WH1065> from overflowing נְהָר֣וֹת <WH5104> the floods חִבֵּ֑שׁ <WH2280> He bindeth וְ֝תַעֲלֻמָ֗הּ <WH8587> and [the thing that is] hid יֹ֣צִא <WH3318> bringeth he forth אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> to light פ
וְֽ֭הַחָכְמָה <WH2451> shall wisdom מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> But where תִּמָּצֵ֑א <WH4672> be found וְאֵ֥י <WH335> how זֶ֝ה <WH2088> he מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> ? and where [is] the place בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> knowledge

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> knoweth אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <WH582> Man עֶרְכָּ֑הּ <WH6187> not the price וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor תִ֝מָּצֵ֗א <WH4672> thereof neither is it found בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַֽחַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> The depth אָ֭מַר <WH559> saith לֹ֣א <WH3808> not בִי־ הִ֑יא <WH1931> me' וְיָ֥ם <WH3220> It [is] not in me and the sea אָ֝מַ֗ר <WH559> saith אֵ֣ין <WH369> else עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against

לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot יֻתַּ֣ן <WH5414> It cannot be gotten סְג֣וֹר <WH5458> for gold תַּחְתֶּ֑יהָ <WH8478> exchange וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יִ֝שָּׁקֵ֗ל <WH8254> be weighed כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> neither shall silver מְחִירָֽהּ׃ <WH4242> [for] the price

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot תְ֭סֻלֶּה <WH5541> It cannot be valued בְּכֶ֣תֶם <WH3800> with the gold אוֹפִ֑יר <WH211> of Ophir בְּשֹׁ֖הַם <WH7718> onyx יָקָ֣ר <WH3368> with the precious וְסַפִּֽיר׃ <WH5601> or the sapphire

לֹא־ <WH3808> cannot יַעַרְכֶ֣נָּה <WH6186> cannot equal זָ֭הָב <WH2091> The gold וּזְכוֹכִ֑ית <WH2137> and the crystal וּתְמ֖וּרָתָ֣הּ <WH8545> it and the exchange כְּלִי־ <WH3627> of it [shall not be for] jewels פָֽז׃ <WH6337> of fine gold

רָאמ֣וֹת <WH7215> shall be made of coral וְ֭גָבִישׁ <WH1378> or of pearls לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not יִזָּכֵ֑ר <WH2142> No mention וּמֶ֥שֶׁךְ <WH4901> for the price חָ֝כְמָ֗ה <WH2451> of wisdom מִפְּנִינִֽים׃ <WH6443> [is] above rubies

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יַ֭עַרְכֶנָּה <WH6186> shall not equal פִּטְדַת־ <WH6357> The topaz כּ֑וּשׁ <WH3568> of Ethiopia בְּכֶ֥תֶם <WH3800> gold טָ֝ה֗וֹר <WH2889> with pure לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor תְסֻלֶּֽה׃ <WH5541> it neither shall it be valued פ
וְֽ֭הַחָכְמָה <WH2451> wisdom מֵאַ֣יִן <WH370> Whence תָּב֑וֹא <WH935> then cometh וְאֵ֥י <WH335> and where זֶ֝֗ה <WH2088> he מְק֣וֹם <WH4725> is the place בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> knowledge

וְֽ֭נֶעֶלְמָה <WH5956> Seeing it is hid מֵעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> from the eyes כָל־ <WH3605> of all חָ֑י <WH2416> of all living וּמֵע֖וֹף <WH5775> from the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> of the air נִסְתָּֽרָה׃ <WH5641> and kept close
אֲבַדּ֣וֹן <WH11> Destruction וָ֭מָוֶת <WH4194> and death אָ֣מְר֑וּ <WH559> say בְּ֝אָזְנֵ֗ינוּ <WH241> thereof with our ears שָׁמַ֥עְנוּ <WH8085> We have heard שִׁמְעָֽהּ׃ <WH8088> the fame
אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> God הֵבִ֣ין <WH995> understandeth דַּרְכָּ֑הּ <WH1870> the way וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> and He יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> thereof and he knoweth אֶת־ <WH853> מְקוֹמָֽהּ׃ <WH4725> the place

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֭וּא <WH1931> he לִקְצוֹת־ <WH7098> to the ends הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the earth יַבִּ֑יט <WH5027> For he looketh תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כָּל־ <WH3605> everything הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> under the whole heaven יִרְאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> [and] seeth
לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> To make לָר֣וּחַ <WH7307> for the winds מִשְׁקָ֑ל <WH4948> the weight וּ֝מַ֗יִם <WH4325> the waters תִּכֵּ֥ן <WH8505> and he weigheth בְּמִדָּֽה׃ <WH4060> by measure
בַּעֲשֹׂת֣וֹ <WH6213> When he made לַמָּטָ֣ר <WH4306> for the rain חֹ֑ק <WH2706> a decree וְ֝דֶ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> and a way לַחֲזִ֥יז <WH2385> for the lightning קֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH6963> of the thunder
אָ֣ז <WH227> Then רָ֭אָהּ <WH7200> Then did he see וַֽיְסַפְּרָ֑הּ <WH5608> it and declare הֱ֝כִינָ֗הּ <WH3559> it he prepared וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also חֲקָרָֽהּ׃ <WH2713> it yea and searched it out

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר ׀ <WH559> he said לָֽאָדָ֗ם <WH120> And unto man הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> Behold the fear אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> of the Lord הִ֣יא <WH1931> that חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> that [is] wisdom וְס֖וּר <WH5493> and to depart מֵרָ֣ע <WH7451> from evil בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> [is] understanding ס
